title: and Related Offences Act 2020 (No. 32 of 2020), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Harassment, Harmful Communications
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Harassment, Harmful Communications 

and Related Offences Act 2020 (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited harassment harmful communication related offence act 2020 (commencement) order 2021

title: and Related Offences Act 2020 (No. 32 of 2020), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 10th day of February 2021 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 10th day of February 2021 is appointed as the day on which the 
Harassment, Harmful Communications and Related Offences Act 2020 (No. 32 
of 2020) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 February, 2021. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [53] 3
